SEARCH
Package com.mjh.innaxyswebapp.data

Interface EdgeRepository

Type Parameters:
Edge - Returning node if the primary key value exists.
Long - Primary key of a relevant edge (ID of the edge).
All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Edge,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Edge,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Edge,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Edge,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Edge,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Edge>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Edge,Long>
public interface EdgeRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Edge,Long>
This interface allows for communication with the PostgreSQL database. It is likely for this particular class to be utilised via a service class so as to apply CRUD. Further, if a primary key that is passed exists within the relevant table, a Edge will be returned, populated with stored data.

      Returns:
      0 if the 'edges' table does not exist, >0 otherwise.
